title: Chris Stapleton & Carly Pearce On Their Dream Collaboration, Working With Chris Stapleton’s Wife Morgan Stapleton & More | ACM Awards 2025
description: Chris Stapleton and Carly Pearce caught up with Billboard’s Lyndsey Havens & Tetris Kelly at the ACM Awards 2025.
author: Stefanie Tanaka
excerpt: Chris Stapleton and Carly Pearce caught up with Billboard's Lyndsey Havens & Tetris Kelly at the ACM Awards 2025.
text: Chris Stapleton and Carly Pearce caught up with Billboard’s Lyndsey Havens & Tetris Kelly at the ACM Awards 2025.
html: Chris Stapleton and Carly Pearce caught up with Billboard’s Lyndsey Havens & Tetris Kelly at the ACM Awards 2025.
